p: In the easy foraging environment, the effect of DTR was most pronounced on cold days ( Fig. 4A, Supplementary Fig. S4A): birds experienced an up to ten-fold increase in mortality over the DTR range in our dataset. Evidence for this is robust since all selected models ( Table 1) included DTR and the interaction between DTR and MinT. Thus, in the easy foraging environment, we found that large DTR increased mortality on cold days, but not on warm days.
